title: Latest Ontology Info Schema
description: Dictionary of ontologies that were used to generate the last run of ontology assets

ontologies.description: A dictionary mapping ontology names to their details.

version.description: Version of the ontology, as defined in its source repository.

source.description: Source URL to find and download the ontology.

filename.description: Name of the ontology file used in this data release.

cross_ontology_mapping.description: Name of the SSSOM file mapping this ontology's terms to cross-species equivalent terms.

additional_ontologies.description: List of additional term ID prefixes to extract from the source ontology file.

map_to.description: List of ontologies to map equivalent terms.

version_uri.description: URI that resolves to the version of the ontology. The resolved version will be used to verify the version of the download ontology file, and backfill the version in ontology_info.json if not provided.

id_separator.description: Character that separates the ontology prefix from the identifier in CURIEs. The default is ':' (colon).
